full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 565 Filed 12/19/21 Page 18 of 83

Instruction No. 11: Multiple Counts

1

2 As I just explained, the Indictment contains six counts. Each count charges Ms. Maxwell with a different crime. You must consider each count separately and return a separate verdict of guilty or not guilty for each. Whether you find Ms. Maxwell guilty or not guilty as to one offense should not affect your verdict as to any other offense charged, unless you are instructed otherwise.

3

4

5

6

7 You may only find Ms. Maxwell guilty of a particular count if the Government has

8 proven each element of the offense charged with respect to that count beyond a reasonable doubt.

17
DOJ-OGR-00008724
